question: you should show good manners in the company of young ladies. which is the appropriate phrase for the bracket expression above?

answer: in cool brain and calculated thought

question: The condition of most slum dwellers is so miserable that it can not be described in words.
A Speech Full Of Too Many Words Is-
To meet trouble halfway means-
Paradise Lost attempted to-
options: justify the ways of god to men
justify the ways of man to god
show that the satan and god have equal power
explain why god and evil are necessary
answer: justify the ways of god to men

question: What is the meaning of the idiom ‘a round dozen’?
options: a little less than a dozen
a little more than a dozen
